tha-ap125:1.1: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇo … purakkhato → suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṁ …pe… purakkhataṁ— evaṁ dutiyantavasena si, sya1ed, sya2ed potthakesu
tha-ap125:2.1: Mahaccā → sahatthā (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
tha-ap125:7.4: pāyasassa → pāyāsassa (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
tha-ap125:10.1: pāyasadāyako → pāyāsadāyako (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
